channel.title: Node on Sanjeev
channel.description: Recent content in Node on Sanjeev

item.title: Install node and npm
item.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome’s V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient. Node.js’ package ecosystem, npm, is the largest ecosystem of open source libraries in the world. Npm is a package manager for JavaScript. Use npm to install, share, and distribute code; manage dependencies in your projects; and share & receive feedback with others. Install node For Windows and Mac users The installer can be downloaded from here.
